Description:
Model
Brand: DIYPC
Model: ARGB-Q18.V2-BK


Details
Type: E-ATX / ATX case
Color: Black
Case Material: Steel / Tempered Glass
With Power Supply: No
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: ATX / E-ATX / Micro ATX / ITX
Side Panel Window: Yes
LED: ARGB


Expansion
External 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 2 +2
Expansion Slots: 7 + 3


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB3.0 / 1 x Type C/ Audio in & out


Cooling System
Fan Options: Side: 3 x 120mm ARGB fan (pre-installed)

Rear: 1 x 120mm ARGB fan (pre-installed)
 
Top: 3 x 120mm or 2 x 140mm fan (Optional)
Radiator Options: Top - Up to 360mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 380 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 190 mm
Max PSU Length: 230 mm
Dimensions (H x W x D): 18" x 9" x 19.92"
Weight: 15 lbs.


Additional Info
Features: DIYPC ARGB-Q18.V2-BK is a panoramic ATX case with a 270° full view of your masterpiece for building high-performance system. It has front and side tempered glass panel, w/top mesh design allow optimized air flow. The case’s design has bigger interior space to accommodate and improve cooling performance (can support up to 380mm x GPU and 360mm radiator x top). It supports up to 230mm long full ATX power supply to run the most power hungry system. 

Advanced cable management design – routing the main cable is easy and quick through a hidden channel.
There is a large space behind the motherboard for all cables, making the case a clean and beautiful look. 
2 ways to control RGB Fan Lighting: Either by Manual RGB LED Button on Top I/O Panel; or if your motherboard has 5v addressable connector, this case has ARGB 5V/3 pin header ready to SYNC w/your motherboard to control RGB lighting.

Supports 2 +2 x 2.5” SSD  behind MB tray 

Supports vertical and horizontal GPU

Water cooling ready – top support up to 360mm radiator

Advanced bottom-mounted power supply design

Top mounted IO ports - USB 3.0 for up-to-date high speed data transfer

7 fans capability (3 x 120mm ARGB fan x side, 1 x 120mm ARGB fan x rear pre-installed) provide great cooling and gaming performance

Magnetic dust filter at top and bottom - easy clean

Support up to 190mm CPU cooler

Support up to 380mm VGA card
Label: Chasis DIYPC ARGB-Q18.V2 Black
